1505-1599: Deposition of the Prince for Permia
Triggered (triggered event, 1441-1443): Union of the Churches for Permia

483001. Principality of Perm'

Permia — Not random

Will happen within 360 days of January 2, 1450
Checked again every 360 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after December 30, 1454)

Description

The Kama region, inhabited by the Komi Permians, was a transit area between Russia and the Steppe. It was a quiet place. In 1451, Grand Duke Vasily II of Muscovy appointed Mikhail Iermolaievich as prince of Perm.

Actions

A. Accept the Russian prince

  • Conditions:
    • All of the following must be true for :
      • State religion is orthodox
    Change religion to orthodox
  • Conditions:
    • All of the following must be true for :
      • State religion is catholic
    Change religion to catholic
  • russian will become an accepted culture
  • +200 relations with Moscow
  • Event 233030 - Principality of Perm' for Moscow is triggered immediately

B. Accept the Russian prince

  • Stability +1

Back to top

483002. Deposition of the Prince

Permia — Not random

Conditions

  • State religion is orthodox
  • Russia exists

Will happen within 360 days of January 2, 1505
Checked again every 360 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after December 30, 1599)

Description

The reign of the Ermolaevich dynasty was turbulent. The Mansi and Tatars ravaged the lands, and relations with Muscovy were tense. Eventually, in 1505, Prince Ivan III sent his governor, Vasily Kovrov, to effectively annex Perm to Russia.

Actions

A. Submit to Russia (End Game)

  • Event 271205 - Russian Rule in Permia for Russia is triggered immediately

B. Submit to Russia (End Game)

  • Stability -3
  • Change religion to pagan
  • -200 relations with Moscow

Back to top

483000. Union of the Churches

Permia — Not random

Triggered by

Action A of 233019 - Union with the Latins? for Moscow
Action B of 40093 - Metropolitan Isidore Accepts the Council of Florence for Moscow

Description

Rus' was baptised in 988, when Christianity was unified. After centuries of schism, the church of northeastern Rus' returned to the true faith, recognising the supremacy of the Metropolitan Isidore of Kyiv. A new reality had arrived.

Actions

A. Let's rejoice for the reunited Church!

  • Stability -3
  • Change religion to catholic
  • +100 relations with Papal States
  • +100 relations with Lithuania
  • +50 relations with Byzantium
  • +50 relations with Moscow
  • Religion in the capital province changes to catholic
  • Global revolt risk +8 for 60 months
  • A random province revolts
  • A random province revolts

B. Orthodoxy will never die!

  • Stability +1
  • -100 relations with Papal States
  • -100 relations with Lithuania
  • -100 relations with Byzantium
  • -100 relations with Moscow
